Moving_Mornig:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Happy>Today is gonna be a good day, I can feel
it! You can walk with me to the work site,
if you want.
Moving_Rain:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Notice>Hm, looks like it's starting to rain.
We should probably find some cover.
Greeting_Rain:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Ease_00>Welcome, welcome. Thanks for stopping
by in this weather.
Rain_Day_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>We don't investigate the ruins when it's
raining, so I fill my time on days like this
double-checking all the supplies.
I like to know what I've got on hand,
just in case I get into a bad situation.
It pays to be prepared!
<sp:3:0:2:0700>If you're planning to head through Gerudo
Canyon, make sure you've prepared
yourself and have everything you'll need.
Rain_Day_02_Thunder:
<sp:3:0:2:0301><snd:Sad>Every single lightning strike startles me!
I completely lose track of what I'm doing
until I recover.
Apparently there's no lightning in
Gerudo Canyon though...

<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:Chat_00>Maybe I should go there.
Shiny_Day_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>I'm investigating these ruins again today.


<sp:3:0:2:0c00>It's hard to believe something this big was
up in the sky in the first place...

Then again, I heard that some huge ruins
fell into Kakariko Village as well, so there
is probably a lot more to this story...
A bunch of researchers have been sent
to those ruins, so I imagine they've made
some kind of discovery by now!
<sp:3:0:2:0700>If you're interested in the ruins, you
should head to Kakariko Village.
Shiny_Day_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>It would be a tragedy if ruins of this size
were left uninvestigated!

We've got to really put in some effort.
We can't have the researchers in Kakariko
Village outdoing us.
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:LaughS>I won't let the temperatures in Gerudo
Canyon get in the way of my work!
Rain_Day_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0500><snd:Ease>Ahhh... The sound of the rain falling is
just so soothing, don't you think?

Gerudo Canyon stays nice and cool when
it rains...
Rain_Day_01_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>While I was double-checking the supplies,
I realized that I've got a bit more than I
need of something.
Here, I'll share this with you.
Shiny_Evening_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0001>Since I've finished up my work for the
day, I'm taking a bit of a breather
right now.
<snd:Ease_01>There's always more to investigate,
so it's important to grab some rest
when you can!
Let's do our best tomorrow!
Rain_Day_01_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:LaughS>It's exciting to run investigations and
make discoveries, whether we're talking
mysterious ruins or just our supplies!
Shiny_Evening_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>That reminds me... I wonder what Quince
and the others are up to right now.
Moving_Evening:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Today was a really productive day. You're
welcome to walk with me if you like.
